metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9445 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: In the Android kernel in F2FS driver there is a possible out of bounds readdue to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with system execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
